name: nanbi12d
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w3, w4)), wb(w1, w3), wb(w2, w4))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w3, w4)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w3))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w4))
-| wi(wa(wb(w1, w3), wb(w2, w4)), wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w3, w4)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w3, w4)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w3))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w4))
-| wi(wa(wb(w1, w3), wb(w2, w4)), wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w3, w4)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wb(w1, w3), wb(w2, w4)), wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w3, w4)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w3, w4)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w3))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w4))

comment: Join two logical equivalences with anti-conjunction. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Jan-2018.)
